Flyable Magic Carpet v 1.0
 
 
(((This is a Clone of j3x Flyable Broomstick mod but with a Magic Carpet in the in the place of the broom)))
............................................................................................
(((You need Skyrim v 1.6 or higher to use this mod)))
.........................................................................................
 
 
 
 
.........................................................................................
 
This mods adds a flyable Magic Carpet and a levitation spell. You can fly around everywhere with it and it will not clip into the terrain. It can also be used as a weapon, shooting deadly bolts of lighting.
You must fight a witch in Alchemist\'s Shack, a small wooden shack located between Haemar\'s Shame and Ivarstead.
You can also craft the carpet with one Broom and 3 Grand Soulgems.
 
.........................................................................................
HOW TO USE
Drop the Carpet to make it rideable. Steer with your mouse and keyboard, it works as any ordinary horse, look up and down to travel up and down. us (j) key to jump
 
You can also cast bolts of lighting with it.
 
 
.........................................................................................
General features of the mod
1 Best Magic Carpet mod out yet.
 
2 Same scripts as J3X\'s Flyable Broom.
 
3 No cliping into the terrain. It has collision.
 
.........................................................................................
Bugs for Magic Carpet
 
1 the name is still broom
 
2 If stuck on down tilt just go down to fix or play with (j) key
 
.........................................................................................
bugs from j3x broom mod
 
- Do not use the levitation spell and the broom at the same time, this WILL cause bugs.
- Creatures and clutters near the broomstick might be influenced by it\'s strong magic field and behave weird.
- The broom thinks he is a horse so he makes horse sounds.
- Sometimes it\'s a bit hard to take of, look up in the sky and run with your broomstick!
- It might be possible for the broom to conflict with some clothes.
- You can use the broom to access areas you should not be able to access.
 
.........................................................................................
 
INSTALLING
- Install as any ordinary mod, dump all files inside skyrim/data
- activate rideable-broom.esp.
- Travel to Alchemist\'s Shack and kill the witch carring the Magic Carpet or craft it.
- Travel to Rannveig\'s Fast and find the spelltome.
.........................................................................................
